profile: Engineering graduate with a strong foundation in software engineering and web development. Proficient in modern web technologies, with hands-on experience building responsive applications. Seeking a role to apply my technical skills, creativity, and engineering mindset.

experience.title: Operations Engineer Trainee
responsibilities: Assisted in project execution and resource management, working collaboratively with the team
Monitored machinery status and workflow to ensure optimal performance

experience.title: Software Engineer Trainee
responsibilities: Worked with embedded systems, including AVR and ARM architectures
Developed software using Python and Linux for embedded applications
Designed and simulated PCBs for various embedded projects
Created a smart home project, integrating hardware and simulation for functionality

projects.name: Graduation Project - Smart Meter
description: Developed an innovative IoT-based application enabling consumers to monitor and manage household energy consumption
Designed a user-friendly interface for tracking power usage across appliances and home zones
Implemented multiple operational modes to optimize energy efficiency
Assembled and managed databases using Firebase for real-time data storage and retrieval

projects.name: Restaurant Reservation System
description: Developed a restaurant reservation and delivery system using data structures
Implemented efficient algorithms for managing reservations, orders, and deliveries
Optimized system performance to handle high volumes of reservations and orders

projects.name: Painting for Kids
description: Developed an interactive painting application for kids using C++ and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles
Implemented shape recognition features to enhance user interaction and creativity
Designed the system with a focus on intuitive functionality and educational value
